## context.isolateContext() function

创建上下文的隔离副本，对副本的修改不会影响原始上下文

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isolateContext<T extends Record<string, any>>(context: Context<T>, initialOverrides?: Partial<T>): Context<T>;
```
